::: {.question}

**Covenant Step-Up — Present Value of Incremental Coupons**

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
library(webexercises)
library(knitr)
set.seed(603)
FV   <- 1000
c1   <- round(runif(1, 0.08, 0.10), 3)
step <- round(runif(1, 0.010, 0.020), 3)
c2   <- c1 + step
y    <- round(runif(1, 0.07, 0.10), 3)
inc  <- FV * step
pv   <- inc/(1+y)^3 + inc/(1+y)^4 + inc/(1+y)^5
ans  <- round(pv, 2)
cat(sprintf("Par: <b>R$ %d</b> | Base coupon: <b>%1.2f%%</b> | Step-up: <b>%1.2f%%</b> (yrs 3–5) | Discount rate: <b>%1.2f%%</b>",
            FV, 100*c1, 100*step, 100*y))
```

Compute the **present value (R$)** of the **incremental coupons** due to the step-up in years 3–5, discounted at the given rate.

::: {.question-block}
<form onsubmit="event.preventDefault();" style="display:flex; gap:8px; align-items:center;">
  <label for="module6_num_q2"><strong>PV of increment (R$):</strong></label>
  <input type="number" id="module6_num_q2" name="module6_num_q2" step="0.01" style="width:220px;"
         data-correct-answer=`r ans` data-tolerance="0.6" />
</form>

<div id="feedback-module6_num_q2" class="feedback" data-status="" style="display:none;">
✅ Increment per year: \(R$ `r round(FV*step,2)`\).  
\(PV = \sum_{t=3}^{5} \frac{R$ `r round(FV*step,2)`}{(1+`r y`)^t} \approx \) <b>R$ `r ans`</b>.
</div>
